title: Fix AI chatbot functionality on Contact page

requirements.text: Implement a functional AI chatbot widget on the Contact page that allows users to interact with an assistant for inquiries and support

quotes: chatboat is not working in the website

acceptanceCriteria: Chatbot interface is visible on the Contact page
Users can type messages and receive responses
Chat interface includes input field, send button, and message display area
Chatbot remains accessible and functional throughout the user session

requirements.text: Update the entire platform color theme to use Royal Teal as the primary accent color and Royal White as the background/neutral color throughout all pages

quotes: change color theme Royal Teal and Royal White

acceptanceCriteria: Primary action buttons, links, and interactive elements use Royal Teal
Background colors and neutral surfaces use Royal White
Color updates are applied consistently across all pages including Home, About Us, Solutions, Network Directory, Careers, Vendors, Ambulance Services, NGO Listing, Dashboard, Contact, and legal pages
Navigation, footer, and all UI components reflect the new color scheme
Dark mode variations maintain the Royal Teal accent appropriately

constraints: Maintain existing Internet Identity authentication flow
Preserve all existing page routes and navigation structure
Keep backend actor unchanged unless chatbot requires data persistence
nonGoals: Integrating external AI services like OpenAI or Anthropic
Modifying backend data models or CRUD operations
